sourcesContent:
// App.js
import React from 'react';
import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, CssBaseline, Box, Container, Grid, Paper, List, ListItem, ListItemText } from '@mui/material';

const App = () => {

  return (
    <Box sx={{ display: 'flex' }}>
      <CssBaseline />
      
      {/* AppBar */}
      <AppBar position="fixed" sx={{ zIndex: (theme) => theme.zIndex.drawer + 1 }}>
        <Toolbar>
          <Typography variant="h6" noWrap>
            Daily Dress Color Suggestions for Women
          </Typography>
        </Toolbar>
      </AppBar>
      
      {/* Sidebar */}
      <Box sx={{ width: 240, flexShrink: 0 }}>
        <List component="nav" aria-label="main mailbox folders">
          <ListItem button>
            <ListItemText primary="Home" />
          </ListItem>
          <ListItem button>
            <ListItemText primary="Suggestions" />
          </ListItem>
          <ListItem button>
            <ListItemText primary="Trends" />
          </ListItem>
          <ListItem button>
            <ListItemText primary="Settings" />
          </ListItem>
        </List>
      </Box>

      {/* Main Content Area */}
      <Box component="main" sx={{ flexGrow: 1, padding: 3 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: 8 }}>
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
            Today's Dress Color Suggestions
          </Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={3}>
            {/* Suggestion Grid */}
            <Grid item xs={12} md={8} lg={9}>
              <Paper sx={{ padding: 2 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6">Suggested Colors for Today</Typography>
                {/* You can add images, icons, or a more detailed component here */}
              </Paper>
            </Grid>

            {/* Charts Section */}
            <Grid item xs={12} md={4} lg={3}>
              <Paper sx={{ padding: 2 }}>
                <Typography variant="h6">Color Trends</Typography>
                {/* Add chart components like bar or pie chart here */}
              </Paper>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default App;
